Some of the bootlegs caught my eye, but in the end this torrent is really sub-par. Some of the albums aren't even complete, and from what I can see (based on track length in relation to the size of each track in MB) the bit rate is shit. I'm glad I paid for all my DK remasters to have all for myself, even with all that's happened between the members.
BTW, Machine Gun in the Clown's Hand is not even a DK album. Hell, it ain't even a bootleg. It's some solo Jello Biafra thing. Dumbass.
Thanks for trying though...I guess.
Some of the albums are organized like crap with all the info in the titles. So I hope you like reorganizing shit.
